member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the background color of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the background color.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetBold
member.summary: Determines whether the style of timed text is bold.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the style of timed text is bold. The variable specifies TRUE if the style is bold; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetColor
member.summary: Gets the color of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a structure that describes the color.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetFontFamily
member.summary: Gets the font family of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the font family of the style.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetFontSize
member.summary: Gets the font size of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the font size of the timed-text style.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetFontStyle
member.summary: Gets the font style of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the font style.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the name of the style.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetRightToLeft
member.summary: Determines whether the right to left writing mode of the timed-text style is enabled.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the right to left writing mode is enabled. The variable specifies TRUE if the right to left writing mode is enabled; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetShowBackgroundAlways
member.summary: Determines whether the style of timed text always shows the background.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a value that specifies whether the style of timed text always shows the background. The variable specifies TRUE if the background is always shown; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetTextAlignment
member.summary: Gets the text alignment of the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value that specifies the text alignment.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.GetTextDecoration
member.summary: Gets how text is decorated for the timed-text style.
member.param: A pointer to a variable that receives a combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how text is decorated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

A pointer to a variable that receives the thickness.
A pointer to a variable that receives the blur radius.

member.name: IMFTimedTextStyle.IsExternal
